website_summaries.verdict: Choose this one if bright light is your top priority, but others on our list have better designs and are easier to attach to your bike.
pros: Stands out for being extremely bright – provides 1,200 lumens
Comes with taillight, rechargeable battery, and waterproof casing
cons: Design is on the bulky side
A few reports of failure to charge after a few months of use

customer_reviews.title: Super bright and compact but unfortunately a problem...
customer_reviews.text: I love this light. I've purchased several. They are very compact, don't get hot, are extremely bright, and use an externally charged batter pack that uses standard USB Type A connections. Unfortunately, I must give this product a 1 star rating even though the product itself is good. This is because the unit I got has a broken handlebar mount. The piece wasn't broken in transit so I suspect someone returned the unit and someone just packaged it back up without checking to make sure the mount was still good. The company has been unresponsive to send me a replacement mount, which would cost them only a couple of dollars probably.
customer_reviews.author: stevefoobar

customer_reviews.title: Switch failed - no reply from customer service
customer_reviews.text: I was quite pleased with the light initially. The brightness seemed good, and the unit felt well made, but within just a few weeks the on/off/mode switch become unreliable. The light was stuck in the on position, so I unplugged the battery, and now it will not come back on. I sent an email to the Te-Rich customer service department including my proof of purchase, but never got any response whatsoever. If they would have honored their stated warranty I would give them a second chance, but now my advice is look elsewhere. I can accept a quality problem, but there is no excuse for poor customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice light, hopefully if they can improve the diameter ...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice light , hopefully if they can improve the diameter of light concentration of high beam that will be great . Having a clear small diameter of very clear view your eyes tends to concentrate on that angle only that could result for out balancing , and also when it comes to bending road it will loose your angle of view not unless it was mounted on top of the helmet . 4 hours biking using high beam and still it has power .
customer_reviews.author: ariel

customer_reviews.title: Would be a good deal but USB connection is bad
customer_reviews.text: The charging cable failed the first day. Connecting it to the batter pulled the metal sheath of the charging cable USB connector. I made do with it though as I though this would not be a big issue. Yesterday, I pulled the cable apart on the light to the battery. I think they have some severe quality issues and need to fix them. I like the light and used it as a backup to my Creo/Magicshine unit. This unit is poorly made. The most important part of a cycling light system is the wiring. 90% of my failed light systems are due to wiring. This one as too quick - less than 2 months of daily use.
customer_reviews.author: rrohret

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing in every way
customer_reviews.text: The mount for the main light does not hold so the light moves around. The strap to hold the battery on does not since down tightly enough to do the job and the battery moves around. The rear light is not rechargeable even though that is implied in the description and it uses button lithium batteries that will have to be replaced often. The light is bright but not that bright. Far from the 1200 lumens that it promises. I was really looking forward to this bike light but find it disappointing in every way.
customer_reviews.author: Marko

customer_reviews.title: Great brightness, great battery life
customer_reviews.text: This is actually my 5th one of these lights, but the other four were purchased under another brand name. They look identical. The battery life is fantastic, and they are super bright at night. We just did a 2.5 hour ride last night, and the batteries lasted just fine. The handlebar mount is very complicated and it comes lose frequently. If I put it on just right then it's solid for the ride. I have had other bike lights that used a stretchy piece of rubber to attach to the handlebar, and I tend to prefer that style of attachment. But for the price, these are the best lights I've had and I'm very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best mount I've Found
customer_reviews.text: The things that set this light apart are the mount and the separate battery. The mount makes it very easy to install on even a tapered section of your handlebars. The light is very compact and balanced because of the lack of integrated battery, so you can target it easily and it stays in place even on rough roads. The external battery means you have a long run time and can easily swap for a different USB power pack if this one ever runs down. I've been using this for months with no problems; I really enjoy the infrequent charging enabled by that huge battery! No issues riding in the sun, rain, and show.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Great all around light
customer_reviews.text: I spent a long time researching lights that I can put on my mountain bike that will allow me to ride trails and see them confidently at high speeds but I didn't want to spend hundreds of dollars. I also was looking for a light with a separate battery pack. This light is very easy to install, very bright, lasts a long time, and checks all the boxes. The material feels very sturdy and strong. Do not let the price fool you, this is a solid light that outperforms other lights I've seen that were going for much much more.
customer_reviews.author: JMoller

customer_reviews.title: Bright!
customer_reviews.text: Very bright bike like... the rest could use some improvement. The instructions are only pictures, and too small to see details. Takes a long time to unscrew the mount from the bars to prevent theft or mount on the useless headlamp strap - which has too short of a top strap and constantly pulls up and off the head. The included taillight does NOT work from the rechargeable battery pack - it takes expensive 2032 coin cell batteries (2 of them). On top of that, right after it was delivered, Amazon suggested THE SAME SETUP, with the same pictures and a different brand name, but at only 2/3 the price and also with free prime 1 day shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Smith

customer_reviews.title: A very good usb powered spotlight
customer_reviews.text: The light is very nice. It's a spot light. It does not throw a wide beam, but does project a bright spot down the road. Perfect for riding in the dark and looking down the road for hazards. The mounting system is ok. It feels like it will eventually break with wear. You can get it nice and tight by using light finger pressure. The battery that comes with it is better than expected. It attaches nicely, but may slip backwards on a tapered top tube. The small tail light is actually not bad. You press the light to turn it on\off and to change modes. No instructions on the tail light.
customer_reviews.author: Ryo

customer_reviews.title: Great starter light for mountain biking
customer_reviews.text: This is a great starter light. Inexpensive and lights up the trail and half the woods while mountain biking. Pros: Super bright. Easy to use push-button switch that indicates on/off. USB-chargeable aux battery (with dual-ended special cable) Mounts very securely to handlebars Cons: The screw-on mount is slightly awkward to twist on while the cables are attached, but not a big deal. Charging requires a special dual-ended USB cable. Lose it and it will be hard to replace. Kind of wish it had a flashing mode, but that's a minor point. Definitely would not want to mount this to a helmet given the external battery pack
customer_reviews.author: armillz

customer_reviews.title: Step into the light Caroline!
customer_reviews.text: This light is awesome! I live in a designated dark community and there are no street lights. After a full battery charge I fired it up for a quick drive around the hood and it lit up the entire street for about 10 houses away! Great compact size, and the red tail light is very bright as well. Install was quick and easy. Definitely recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: amazing value. lights up the whole street.
customer_reviews.text: I ride my bike nearly 365 days a year so I need a good set of lights. i have a serfas battery pack with a built in thunderbolt tail light. the aux usb port on that battery powers this lamp just fine. heck i bet with an otg cable you could power the lamp with your phone for short trips. This is more than enough lumens for commuting and even for woods riding. the bar mount is nicer than a rubber strap that tends to shift the light if you hit a bump. i really doubt this light will have that issue but it is still pretty fast to take off/put back on.
customer_reviews.author: kowalski

customer_reviews.title: Super Bright!! And Versatile
customer_reviews.text: Great light Soo glad I found this product. They are several different configurations of this type and several different manufacturers on Amazon. I had purchased a different manufacturer and was pleased with my purchase. I lost the headlight that I also used for my night walks because it conveniently fit in my hand and was easy to carry. It was that lost caused me to look for a replacement. I'm so glad I did, I saw the video and was impressed by the brightness. Then when I ordered it and was pleasantly surprised that the light came with a headstrap that you can afford the light too and gives another use for this super bright light.
customer_reviews.author: Doublenickel

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This is what I was looking for! I ride my bike to work and with the winter months setting in I needed a good headlight. I searched and search for something that was well priced, small, super bright, and provided the right lighting pattern - this light is exactly what I was looking for. About the size of a 1.5” cube this unit also doubles as a headlamp with a provided head strap. It has 3 brightness modes and long run time. I’d say, if you’re looking for something similar then look no further.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great light for city riding
customer_reviews.text: Light is very bright and makes it easy to be seen by everyone on the road, just have to be sure to angle it down as to not blind anyone. The mounting mechanism was very easy to install and easy to remove as needed with no damage to my handlebar. I appreciate being able to use my own power bank when needed....hasn't happened yet as the battery seems to last a very long time, but nice to know I won't be left in the dark. Wish the tail light that comes with it was rechargeable, but oh well, button cells are easy to replace. I recommend this light for anyone looking for a well made, heavy duty, bright ass light.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Light the night
customer_reviews.text: This light exceeded my expectations in terms of brightness. It's shockingly small for the candlepower it puts out. My only gripe is that it's pretty easy to strip the tightening mechanism because the plastic threads are pretty flimsy. However, even if I have to duct tape this thing to my handlebars, I'll stick with it. The battery life is great, the focus of the light is perfect and I finally feel comfortable riding at high speed in (otherwise) pitch blackness. The included tail light is not something I'd use because I already have a Ascher USB Rechargeable Bike Light Set. The headlight with the Ascher set isn't very useful, but the tail light is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Barron Henley

customer_reviews.title: Solid!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a solid light. I DONT THINK it’s 1200 lumens as described, but I don’t have a way to test that. Used it tonight for the first time on a 2 hour ride and battery held up, on high, the entire time. 4 stars is due to the light not being 1200 lumens but can’t go wrong with this. Updated 2/24/2018: I’m changing my review to a five star because this light is very well built, very bright and it did pass the waterproof test yesterday. The beam goes out much further than my bontrager 800 which is probably the reason it doesn’t seam as bright. You can’t go wrong with this.
customer_reviews.author: Roll Tide

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievable
customer_reviews.text: This bike light is incredible. I'm surprised it doesn't have more reviews. Hard to explain, but it is super bright! I went out biking with my son on a trailer behind me and it ended up getting dark on us. This light was so bright that I ended up using it on the lowest setting which was sufficiently bright. Had I done the brightest setting it would have been like using a car headlight. This is one purchase you will not regret. It attaches to the bike very easily and it stays secure. I like that it is easy to remove and recharge. Excellent Product.
customer_reviews.author: AZAccountant

customer_reviews.title: Seems a little heavy for helmet mount.
customer_reviews.text: I originally got this light as a helmet-mounted light. I have found that the provided mount has the light sticking pretty high above the helmet. I had a couple of near misses with tree limbs. Also with the light and battery attached to my helmet, my neck seemed to be getting sore after my 90-minute commutes. One other comment; the light is very bright and for my early morning commute rides it really attracts the flying bugs to the eyes and face. I have decided to move this to the handlebar. It is still a great light. So far the charging is pretty quick, too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great light and long run time.
customer_reviews.text: We purchased two of these for our kids bicycles and they are great! We have been using these for a few years now and would gladly buy again and need two more for our other kids. The one complaint I have is the handle bar mount. The bike handlebar mount (both) broke the first 12-13 months of use. I would appreciate a solid mount just as much as the great light. As a parent I really like the blinking option for daytime or dusk bicycling.
customer_reviews.author: 5H Palo Cedro CA

customer_reviews.title: Solid, bright and practical light.
customer_reviews.text: I rarely get excited with my purchases, but this one is really make me happy. Package contain the essentials, no more no less. Light is metal, compact yet produces a super bright light. It doesn't heat, and maintains brightness through out the entire 3 hour bike ride from a pre-charge battery. Mounting is simple yet effective. No wiggle and an easy install. Accessory head band is comfortable and easy transition from bike light to headlight.
customer_reviews.author: nhajk0709

customer_reviews.title: The light is amazing but the mount no longer works
customer_reviews.text: The light was working just fine I had it mounted to my road bike. Then I got a new bike so I wanted to move the light to my new bike. After taking it off my original bike I could not put it on the new bike. The clamp part of the light no longer works. I cannot get it to tighten down onto the handle bar.
customer_reviews.author: Noelle

customer_reviews.title: Light, batteries, charging great. BUT the switch fails quickly, bar mount didn't hold on bumpy roads
customer_reviews.text: Been through two of these in about 1 year (daily commute, rain, bumps etc.). Everything is great except that the on/off/mode button stops functioning after a few months, and the bar mount fails (over time, loosens and can't tighten it enough to keep steady because the screw threads are plastic). I'm moving to another headlight as a result. Ran into both flaws with both headlights. Really liked the brightness, the USB charging with charge-complete indicator lighting in the cables, but if the on/off switch stops working and you can't trust the light to be facing forward over bumpy roads, it's a no-go.
customer_reviews.author: bp

customer_reviews.title: Very bright, poor mount and connectors
customer_reviews.text: This light worked great doing early morning/late evening fat bike rides in the snow. However, the mount doesn't stick very well to the bar. It often gets bumped and has to be re-setup. So far I haven't been able to unplug the light from the battery pack to recharge it. Maybe it doesn't like very cold weather? Also the headlamp strap is weird. It uses the bar mount on front of the headband rather than the light directly attaching.
customer_reviews.author: Beergod

customer_reviews.title: A nice bright, good value light that is overall designed well.
customer_reviews.text: What I like about this light: 1. The size is small and unobtrusive. 2. You can easily mount it topside or underneath your handlebar. It stays put either way. I've had no problem with the included mount but I do wish it was a bit more substantial. 3. The battery is separate, nice to know you can back an extra USB phone battery to power it if needed. 4. Very bright! I would still recommend combining this light with a headlamp though if riding outside of the city or on trails. 5. The price is right! 5. Included tail light is as good as any other I've used. It is not rechargeable but isn't a concern for me.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Lund

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Holy hell what a light! I was skeptical, as there was no way a light with such a price could be that great. I bike to work in pitch black, sometimes in conditions that make sufficient light necessary. The two previous lights I was using cost a total of 80 bucks and didn't match 1/4th the power of this light! The only reason I hesitate from giving this a full 5 stars is that the mounting mechanism could have been better designed. But other than that, it's really amazing! Probably going to purchase a second one before winter.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: It is a powerful headlight!
customer_reviews.text: This is such a powerful headlight that velo club members joked me he thought I was a car. A few friends bought the exact same one as they liked mine so much. I have used it almost 2 years without any problems, but all the sudden the button stuck. I was playing with it (turning the button left) thinking if I could repair it somehow, and the button popped right back, and it is a good as new again. I don't ride in the rain, so I cannot tell how water proof it is. Probably I should not use the blinking mode on a bike path as a couple of pedestrians complained me he feared the light cause epilepsy...
customer_reviews.author: Noriko🐥🐝

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work, USB connection shorting out straight out the box
customer_reviews.text: Product works great but only when you squeeze the USB connector at a specific angle. Straight out the box there is a major short between the light and the battery. When it does work you will get a nice bright and focused beam but the short in the connection prevents usage
customer_reviews.author: Colene

customer_reviews.title: Not a good choice.
customer_reviews.text: Not even 12 months later and the light stopped working. Reached out to vendor and they will not respond. It’s a bright light and would be a great product if it would last or at least receipt response from the seller. As of 1/30/2019 I am updating my review. Apparently some kind of communication issue occurred on the first contact and I didn't receive the sellers response. Seller provided a very quick response to my second contact and is being very helpful with a free battery replacement. The light works fine so no need to replace the entire assembly. If any changes take place for the worse, I will update once again.
customer_reviews.author: Tony C

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: Best bang for your buck! The headlight is absolutely powerful! It is super bright. I like that it has a separate battery pack and that the light is easy to install/remove. The taillight also works well and is very bright. It's the best light I've ever had. Worth a five start!
customer_reviews.author: Haoran shi

customer_reviews.title: Number 1 bike light on the market.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent bike light. I love the USB plug.If the bike battery dies, it is a USB plug, so any back up batteries you have will power your light. All the other lights have only a wall plug to recharge. This one is a USB. Very rare. High quality light. The bike attachment is extremely well done, will not fall off and no one will steal it. Battery charges up for hours or riding time. FIVE STAR LIGHT. IT is My favorite and I bought 6 different brands and styles over the past two years, I ride 3000 miles a year, and most of the time at night. This is the best light on the market.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: The light is fantastic... Charging cable is suspect
customer_reviews.text: Pros: size, aluminum housing, seems to be a quality product, plenty of lumens for night trail riding, like the mounting hardware. Cons: usb recharging cable came apart during first use -1 star. Didn't use the rear light, rather had better quality charge cable, also comes with head band why whould anyone use this as a headlight??? Initial thoughts: I wish that they get rid of the headlight band and rear light and include a better charge cable. I've only used this on 1 ride so far will do an update in a few months.
customer_reviews.author: VMO1mech

customer_reviews.title: TESTED & TRUE 1200 LUMENS+
customer_reviews.text: I tested this light against others of different lumens and can confirm that it generates a true "1200 Lumens." There is a chance that it might be brighter too. This model is much brighter than lights I own that claim they are 1600 lumens with double the size battery packs. In addition, I really like the easy to install kit and small (but light) battery. Worth every penny. Five stars! The little red light that is included is worthless.
customer_reviews.author: Benefit of the doubt

customer_reviews.title: Wow this is bright!
customer_reviews.text: Great light for the price! Very bright with a a clean clear white light. the dispersion pattern is just right in my opinion. only 2 downsides i can see. 1) no helmet mount for trail riding. 2) The handlebar mount is a bit fussy to take on and off quickly. I use the handle bar mount and don't need remove the light so its no problem for me. Considering the price i could not be happier!
customer_reviews.author: Raymond

customer_reviews.title: Good, versatile light
customer_reviews.text: While I don't think this light is as bright as advertised, it is still pretty darn bright. I'm very pleased how it can light up the path ahead of me. The battery life has been great, I've had it on for two hours on max setting and had no issue. I usually have it mounted on my bike, but the head mount is also awesome. It takes a couple minutes to port it over to the head strap. It is a very good product overall, I'm thinking about getting a second one to wear on my head for nighttime biking, so I can scan the turns better than my current set up allows.
customer_reviews.author: Shane

customer_reviews.title: Product is exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: Light is extremely bright and was very easy to install. A quality product compared to lights I had in the past. I would like to see the rear light scaled up to a larger size. Even though it is still very bright, it would more visible if it was 2x’ the size. I am considering ordering a second light for my wife’s bike. The charging cable is great with the color change from red to blue when fully charged.
customer_reviews.author: randall a. ferris

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, Bright Light
customer_reviews.text: Love the size, well constructed, can pivot in any direction I need to see. & plugs right unto my my ebikes usb port to use with bikes battery. The only thing that did not work from the get go was the free rear light, & the instructions could be a bit bigger to be able to see / read. Other than that I give it a 5 star rating would recommend purchasing & may purchase a second light.
customer_reviews.author: Avelino

customer_reviews.title: works great and perfect for night rides
customer_reviews.text: The light is great, all 3 light modes are more than enough to light the path. I really like the mounting system, easy to use and easy to tighten. The rear light is very bright as well and all 3 modes on that work great as well. Have not tried any of the other accessories but with the brightness of the light it seems like it would work great as a headlamp also. Will post pictures later
customer_reviews.author: Ramon R. Salazar

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband as one of his bike accessories. He did not have much luck in the past with lights. He has used the light and absolutely appreciated the brightness for the area's he rides that have little to no light. Also received tail light, which we didn't realize when purchasing so that was a bonus. The headlight also blinks which is something he was looking for. All-in-all it was a very good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Lorrie A. Burrow-reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Bought 3 so far, put them on all my bikes!
customer_reviews.text: This light is pretty good. I think it's the best bike light you can get for $30. I bought it about 18 months ago and have had really good luck with it (decided to get more). The light is bright enough to use around town and on an Ebike. I haven't spent much time with it off road (where there is little to no ambient light). The mount could be better quality and I have broken one simply from tightening it too much but if you don't go crazy it won't break.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer sorenson

customer_reviews.title: Crazy bright and waterproof
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend this light. I've used it for over a year and it is holding up well. Pros: -> This is one of the brightest lights on the market -> Rechargeable battery is universal -> 4 different power modes Low, Med, High, Flash -> Truly waterproof -> Rugged Cons: -> Mounting system is not as solid as more expensive solutions
customer_reviews.author: Elliot

customer_reviews.title: Awesome light
customer_reviews.text: Update: started bike commuting early in the morning, oncoming cars flash their lights at me this is so bright! Very bright, I use the strobe now during day time rides for increased visibility. Several passing cyclists have commented on how bright it is and have been impressed. I'm enjoying this light a lot. It has a small footprint on my bars but puts out a crazy amount of light. Battery life has been great, as mentioned in the description. I like that the battery pack uses a USB and can be used to charge a mobile phone if needed. Would buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Megavol

customer_reviews.title: Great bike light
customer_reviews.text: Great bike light. Started trail riding nights and realized real quick I needed a powerful headlight and helmet light. This seemed like the vest bang for the $$ and certainly fit the bill. Very strong light for the money. Good construction.
customer_reviews.author: Geoffrey Bunger

customer_reviews.title: Very bright and reliable so far
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace a MagicShine unit that kept having battery issues in the heat and it hasn't crapped out yet despite near 100degF temps (and way higher in the garage). The mounting system on this one is very good and secure, much better than the elastic band mounts that others provide. It's also plenty bright and I often use it on the second brightness level so as not blind oncoming traffic. The only downside is that rear light is powered by it's own disposable batteries; I would have preferred a system that Tees it into the rechargeable battery.
customer_reviews.author: J. Chow

customer_reviews.title: Bright, cheap, light.
customer_reviews.text: Genuinely surprised by the light so far. Of course everything is graded on a sliding scale and at $32 it's pretty easy to impress, but the cons are way out weighed by the pros here. This thing is bright, well built, easy enough to setup/use. The only real negative so far is the mount and that's really just preference, why can't everyone just use gopro mounts? They are almost ubiquitous in the bike market. Would make helmet and bar mounting way better/easier. Still, unless this thing dies on me for no reason, it's a homerun. I will update if anything changes..
customer_reviews.author: pisgahhiker

customer_reviews.title: Lumens Galore
customer_reviews.text: I have issues seeing at night, so I wanted really bright lights. This really delivers on that front. I like that there are three brightness settings. The brightest setting can be annoying to fellow riders, and I have no issue turning it down. The battery pack attached is a little bulky, so I hide that by attaching it to the down tube. Even though I tighten the lights before I ride, they do get a little loose while I ride.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: GREAT LIGHT!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this light because the 800Lumen light at the bike store was $100, This is 1200Lumens and it really lights up the night, I ride between 0500 and 0700, When I make it to the bike trails which runs through a forest I can see everywhere, it has a great beam pattern. I am currently waiting to recharge to see how many bike rides I get out it. I liked it so much I bought one for wife's bike so I'm carrying her battery with me in the event it dies during my test.
customer_reviews.author: TexVet

customer_reviews.title: Will not stay in position
customer_reviews.text: This is a bright light but the adjustment knob to maintain the horizontal angle of illumination does not function well and the swivels to an extreme angle. Also, the strap to tighten on the handle bars is too slippery to grab a tapered bar and the light rotates upside down. A bright light but not good mounting. Definitely requires hacks.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Great auxiliary light for enduro, too.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this light to put on my dirtbike to fill in the dark spots from the headlight; instead of using the battery pack I plugged it directly into a USB socket on the dash. It works quite well in this configuration. The light from this fills in the gaps immediately in front of the bike amazingly. Most of the time I only run it on low, because it is more than bright enough. I've run it for over 2500 miles and it has survived several dumps, lumps and spills.
customer_reviews.author: CL H1

customer_reviews.title: Bright but poor width and distance of beam
customer_reviews.text: This is a fair light. It is bright but the distance is poor and the width of the beam is extremely narrow. Pretty blinding to oncoming traffic too. I bought this for my wife's bike because it was less expensive than the one I bought for my bike and she doesn't ride frequently. I always lead at night for I am not comfortable with her light. I plan on replacing it if she decides to ride alone at night.
customer_reviews.author: Colin Wharton

customer_reviews.title: I was illuminating the road and surrounding field of view better than they could with smaller lights
customer_reviews.text: You can burn your retinas with bright bike light if you want to. I used it for night time bike ride in town and had no problem seeing objects or road hazards when there was little street light ambiance to assist. Compared to the other bikers, I was illuminating the road and surrounding field of view better than they could with smaller lights. I'm sure they missed me when eventually passed them. For the price and power of the Cree bulb, this is one I would highly recommend. Also I operated the light at the mid level as I didn't need high power to see clearly in the dark.
customer_reviews.author: Dartman1452242

customer_reviews.title: My second one!
customer_reviews.text: I liked this light A LOT. It's convenient because I never had to remotthe whole light, just the battery! It's very bright. I used to have to commute before dawn and this light helped with visibility. I figured what's better than one of these? Two, mounting one on each side of my handle bar! Also, charging is easy, the usb cable lights up; blue/red. It's very convenient!
customer_reviews.author: RaNiiTH

customer_reviews.title: Solid light
customer_reviews.text: Very bright light. It does have a pretty distinct hot spot in the center of the beam, but the spread is pretty solid. Would definitely benefit from a diffuser lens, but does the job as is when used with a good helmet mounted spotlight, if you’re using this on the handlebar. Battery lasts long enough to go on a least a couple of 2 hours rides, but I haven’t had it due on me before i recharge.
customer_reviews.author: P. Chaplin

customer_reviews.title: Wow Oh My My This Thing Bright!!
customer_reviews.text: So I read the reviews and thought everyone was BSing about the brightness then I saw the reviews with pictures and decided to give this a try and I bought it. Damn the reviews weren't lying; the light is incredibly bright and everything seems really sturdy and great quality. Definitely quality of brightness that’s for sure.
customer_reviews.author: HBTourSlam

customer_reviews.title: Great light, bad mounting
customer_reviews.text: Bought this back in February and just getting around to using it, last night was my first night mountain bike ride so first time using it. The light itself is super bright and is all you need to light up the trails. However, the mounting system did not tighten and I had to gorilla tape it to my handlebars to use it. I may have just received a bad set or refurbished set because my red light does not work either. Considering buying another if the mounting has been improved since then.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Holy brightness!
customer_reviews.text: Holy molly this light is BRIGHT! I honestly wasn’t expecting much given the size of the light itself but I was truly pleasantly surprised. The brightness is superb, the only thing that could use improvement is the diameter of the lit area. I’m ordering one of these for my son who rides his bike on his way to and back from school. I would know that he will be safe and seen on the road with a light like this.
customer_reviews.author: K. G.

customer_reviews.title: waterproof?  hardly
customer_reviews.text: I have not had luck with this light since I got it. I find I have to press the button to turn on the light a lot. Waterproof? The USB connection on the light is totally rusted and can not use it at all. The rear light only lasted a couple of months. Not worth the price or aggravation.
customer_reviews.author: Betsy

customer_reviews.title: I'm one Happy Arizona Camper! Awesome light-FINALLY!
customer_reviews.text: Very bright light with an awesome mount that puts those lights with cheap rubber band mounts to shame! Rode for over an hour and still bright as heck. Hopefully the battery will last longer than those cheap rubber band mounted lights with a useless battery pack it only lasts about half an hour! The installation took less then 10 minutes. Buy one, it's worth it! The tail light is pretty cool too! OH, point light down-it will blind drivers especial in strobe mode!
customer_reviews.author: dezurtdude

customer_reviews.title: Very bright
customer_reviews.text: I hooked this up on my mountain bike it really lights up the road. I like the fact that it has 3 intensities. It also has strobe mode but I don't use that. I charged it when I first got it 2 months ago and it is still as bright as the first day, I think I will charge it again just because it has been so long since the last and first charge. clean install looks great. I like the way the on off switch lights up green when the unit is turned on
customer_reviews.author: bushwacker

customer_reviews.title: Works great for ESK8!
customer_reviews.text: I use this for esk8 at night. Its super bright and light weight. Even better when I'm riding +20 mph it keeps the path lite up very well. To mount it to my helmet i used a shredlight helmet mount and a screw and nut from Lowe's along with the fastner from the light mounting kit and hit it with hot glue. 10/10 would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Love our bike lights!
customer_reviews.text: I love our bike lights! We ordered one for each of us 4 and they have been life savers. We often find ourselves in the zone wandering off and it has been great having lights as the sun sets. I charge our lights about once a month and they last long. I love the mounting system on them for the fact that I never have to worry about losing them on the road. They do need to be adjusted every so often but they are built in a way that it isn't hard to do on the road without tools.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: headlight
customer_reviews.text: This is a great light. Very bright, was to mount on the handle bars, love the ease of charging and plug in. This is an excellent light. I ride in the hills and at night it lights up the sky. During the day the flashing red light to the rear works well too. Im very happy with this product and the price was right also.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well worthit!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome, worked exactly as advertised. I have owned several lights in the past and I am very, very happy with this lite. Easy to operate! Now, I just need to keep my girlfriend from confiscating it from me, she now thinks her light is too weak!
customer_reviews.author: zebra20

customer_reviews.title: Lots of brightness for the price
customer_reviews.text: I love how easy it is to install and tighten onto the handlebars. The light has a decent size spill and has a perfect distance for night riding. It illuminates well on city streets too. Battery life is great. I went about 2 weeks without having to charge it while riding daily. I am very impressed with this light.
customer_reviews.author: Luis I.

customer_reviews.title: Shorted out after 6 mo.
customer_reviews.text: I light itself had good light coverage for night trail riding. I'd probably give it 4 stars if it kept working but it started shutting off during rides after only half a year(good thing I had my headlamp too). I can't recommend it's purchase even at that reasonable price because you can't use a light that might shut off even when fully charged.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica M.

customer_reviews.title: Small but mighty!
customer_reviews.text: For the price, I wasn't expecting a lot, I was looking to replace a much more expensive light that didn't mount to a 35mm bar, and these were recommended to me by another rider. So far, they are great! Bright, not sure they are truly 1200 lumens, but if you get 2 of them, they will do the job just fine on a trail.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn H.

customer_reviews.title: Damn bright light
customer_reviews.text: Light works better than expected and super bright only drawback is riders kept looking back to see what the hell was coming behind them so bright. When put on flicker mode the light really shines as you can see it reflecting off all reflective signs and materials done the road at least a half mile down. Incredible light multi attachments to use definite 5 stars for the price. The battery life was good for 2+ hour ride and no issues with movement as long as you tighten down appropriately. This light was brighter than any other bike light I passed on the road while using.
customer_reviews.author: quiquiyoso

customer_reviews.title: Bright Light and Great Battery!
customer_reviews.text: I've had several different similar lights over the past few years and this one stands above the rest with a very bright light and excellent battery life. It's also one of the few that is adjustable in both directions, meaning you can mount it anywhere on the handlebar and still point it directly ahead. The beam pattern is a bit too "spot" for me but this minor shortcoming is easily overcome by the brightness of the light.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Small But Mighty!!
customer_reviews.text: This light is so amazing! I use it for my electric scooter when I ride early in the morning and at night. I like the mounting system because it's quick to adjust on the go. It is really bright. I've never had to use it on full brightness, the two lower settings are plenty bright for me. If you're looking for a super bright inexpensive bike light, you won't be disappointed with this one!
customer_reviews.author: GreeneBean3408

customer_reviews.title: Great light and even greater price
customer_reviews.text: Great great light. Has 3-4 brightness modes and a blinking feature. The light housing is aluminum and the battery is made of a hard plastic...very sturdy...The USB battery charges quickly...and it's easy to mount. There are very similar lights that REI sells for hundreds more....I'm sure the build quality is a tiny bit better but it's not worth +$100 more difference.
customer_reviews.author: Hoverpod

customer_reviews.title: Lot of power in this little light
customer_reviews.text: It took me a minute (or 2 lol) to figure out how to attach the light to the bar but after that it was smooth sailing. Took it for a test ride right before dawn on a trail with no lights and it was great! I can see everything in front of me and to the sides and even on the 2nd setting it was good enough. Highly recommend this for anyone who loves riding but doesn't want to wait till it's bright enough :)
customer_reviews.author: Beata

customer_reviews.title: Bright and durable
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my husband to use when he works in dark places on construction and plumbing projects. Durable and bright. Rechargeable and extremely bright. He has had numerous headlamps and thinks this one is the best
customer_reviews.author: Marie Billings

customer_reviews.title: BUY NOW DOESN'T HEAT UP AT ALL
customer_reviews.text: this is the best bike/scooter(40mph Dualtron) light out there run two of these off my Dualtron Eagle pro, and buying another set for my Ultra 2 that goes 60mph. makes me look like a car JUST BUY im running them off a 26,000 mwh battery and two extenders and works great full power cold to the touch when done with morning ride like an hr or more can't recommend enough bright enough to spot major potholes when im going 35-40 mph
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I am an avid mtn bike rider who does a lot of night riding. I spend a good amount of my time in the Philippines riding the jungle trails and coastal roads both night and days rides. This light has been a constant friend friend on my handlebars in very challenging conditions...intense rain, high humidity, salt air. This light has always lived up to the challenge, both night and day (strobe mode). Makes paying high prices for name brand models seem silly. Wherever I have a bike, in the US or the Philippines, I have several of these great lights available. The only thing I would suggest is to make the mounting system more compatible for larger diameter handlebars.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Compact, sturdy, easy to use and setup
customer_reviews.text: I only had 3 criteria while looking for bike lights, compact, decent battery capacity and brightness. All 3 of them are met by this product. The light is very easy to install. Basically just 2 straps. It is also small so you don't have a scope sticking out of your handle bar. Very simple design as well. You have one power button and one battery that powers it that's it. Package also came with a headlamp strap if you wish to convert to a headlamp. Only had the opportunity to use it for 4 hours so far on medium and low setting. Light hasn't died but decided to charge again. Ordered a second one for my girlfriend.
customer_reviews.author: Laurence

customer_reviews.title: Bright Light Bright Light
customer_reviews.text: Wow I was really amazed at the output of this little guy. Has 3 output settings and on high its bright. Battery pack is small and compact and fits nicely on the side of the frame. Light itself fits nicely on the handlebars and is very small compared to other lights I have used. Only about 1.5" square but has better output than any other light I have used before.
customer_reviews.author: Wmlipe

customer_reviews.title: Super Bright, Waterproof, and Rechargeable
customer_reviews.text: It is bright, small, and rechargeable (although I have yet to do so). It came charged, and the several comments in old reviews that the green light did not go off on shutting down does not hold for me. The only problem that I have is that my wife bought a bike light about a month ago, paid more for it, and it is not as bright (even at my lowest setting). I may have to go for another one. I have yet to have the occasion to test the "waterproof" claim, but trust that this is good.
customer_reviews.author: Sir B

customer_reviews.title: Bright light that last long.
customer_reviews.text: Due to being diagnosed with seizures I can't drive for 6 months. So I but this light so I can ride my Bicycle to work. Th e light is very bright and battery lasted on my 45 minute commute to work. It is very easy to mount, and does not require any tools. The rear blinker is bright and works well. You will need to unscrew the rear light and remove a piece of paper between the batteries for it work. Did not see that anywhere in instructions. Just bought my second one for my other bike.
customer_reviews.author: Waldozer

customer_reviews.title: Purchase now
customer_reviews.text: Purchase now over 3hrs of use and still havent needed to charge great product and very visible from far away local police department gave compliments on this product and is usb capable of charging ur phone back light is visible that was included but is small for my liking other then that great buy thanks amazon
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!  Super bright at Max & can be set to Low or Flashing, nice mount, nice USB charger, great tail light!
customer_reviews.text: I love this light! It is ridiculously bright. It looks like a car's headlight in front of me. It has a few settings too, like super bright, medium, low, and flashing. The tail light is cool too. It comes with a nice mount and I love the USB charger. I am very happy with this. I can ride at night in the darkest of trails and if I am on the street cars will have no problem seeing me.
customer_reviews.author: smullis1

customer_reviews.title: Bright light!!
customer_reviews.text: Super bright light for this little guy! I was really surprised. I bought it because it was cheap until I could shop for a really good one for my bike commute to work but this light is so bright, I got what I needed. I ride to work at 330am and lights up everything in front of me. Mounting is easy and adjustable. 100% am getting another one for the kids bike. You won’t be disappointed
customer_reviews.author: rocky

customer_reviews.title: This is a really bright light and works great. It's strobe mode is blinding and cars actually ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a really bright light and works great. It's strobe mode is blinding and cars actually get angry when I run it. Good. My only reason I didn't rate this 5 stars was the battery is fairly small and only lasts about 3-4 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Dirty Hippie

customer_reviews.title: Very Bright Light
customer_reviews.text: What I didn't understand about this product is how you could wear a helmet using this as a head lamp. It look about 1 hour to charge the batter pack. The light is very bright and the tail light has two batteries. Overall this is a very well made product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: BRIGHT!
customer_reviews.text: The light is BRIGHT! Takes abuse and keeps kicking. Used sparingly but have gone for up to 8 hours, off and on, between charges. Four stars because after 6 months light stopped working. For 33 bucks, still a screaming great deal. Waiting for seller to respond to find out if warranty will replace LED section. Will update to 5 stars if so!
customer_reviews.author: T5901

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely great value for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I was researching good lights for my sons Trek Precaliber 24 bike and I came across this one. The moment I received it, I fell in love with it. It is small, really really bright, and it has all the features I need. I like how they designed the charging cable with two lights to indicate when it is charging (red) and when it is fully charged (blue). I ended up using the helmet mount to mount the light on my kids handlebars with zip ties to reinforce its position. Regarding the quality, I cannot comment yet because I only had mine for a few days now. Overall, it is definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia David

customer_reviews.title: 5 star! Love it
customer_reviews.text: This thing is the best!! And I bike a lot, especially at night cuz I don't like the heat. It really lights up your path but also cars see you. I really like it, if ur gonna ride at night get this light. Battery is also excellent, ive had to charge it maybe once or twice? And ive had it for months now and use it frequently.
customer_reviews.author: sheila

customer_reviews.title: THIS IS AMAZING!
customer_reviews.text: I usually ride at 5:00 in the morning down by the beach, and this light is a godsend. I have no trouble with seeing thing and being seen. The battery lasts for plenty of time and is well worth the money. I really like the fact that I don't have to take the light off to charge it like other lights. Definitely would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: erikdschiller

customer_reviews.title: Great light for visibility and life but has quirks
customer_reviews.text: This light is super bright and helps make me visible when riding in traffic. I have been also quite pleased with the battery life. However, within 2 months, my light has developed an issue where the light turns on by itself, so I have to not only turn off the light, but also disconnect the light from the battery pack when I am not using the bike.
customer_reviews.author: ece02006

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME is an understatement...
customer_reviews.text: if you are looking for a seriously bright well focused light, this is the one you want.... you know when you have your light on low/strobe, and people yell at you to turn your F$#king light down from the sidewalk, it's doing it's job.... best light I've ever had on a bile in 30 years... rear light that comes with it is wimpy, would suggest a usb rechargeable rear as well.
customer_reviews.author: dink

customer_reviews.title: User Friendly & Most Effective
customer_reviews.text: I love how the Super Bright Bike Light literally does what it is called! It is easy to assemble and attach to any bike. I bought one for myself, my wife, and my kids, and it straps right onto the handle bars and the bike frame with ease! My only gripe is with attaching the light unit to the actual mount in that you have to play with it/adjust it a few times before it faces in the proper direction. But other than that, it’s brighter than most of the car head lights on the road, making you and your loved ones easily noticeable! I highly recommend it and for the price point, you can’t beat that!
customer_reviews.author: Jason Francisco

customer_reviews.title: Glad I didn’t spend more....
customer_reviews.text: I thought I’d give this light a try for my mountain bike night rides. Was skeptical because of the price, but I’m glad I ordered it. Solid build and bright! Will be ordering another light in the Te-Rich line now for my helmet.
customer_reviews.author: JamieJosh

customer_reviews.title: Bike Light
customer_reviews.text: Great light at a great price. I have several bike lights and this is equal to lights I have paid triple for in the past. Battery is really light weight and easy to mount with simple strap. Mount seems a bit questionable. Not sure how durable it will be but for now it works fine. Was delivered the next day which is always a great bonus. At this price I plan on ordering another so I don’t have to switch from bike to bike.
customer_reviews.author: Kim W.

customer_reviews.title: Great Light For The Money
customer_reviews.text: The light is great! Nice shaped beam for both a little throw and wash. Perfect for riding. The only problem I ran into was the mounting clip cracked. Customer service got me a replacement in less than 3 days. Very please otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: A.Clark

customer_reviews.title: POWERFULLY BRIGHT WITH IMPROVED WATERTIGHT PLUG!
customer_reviews.text: Updated review with the improved watertight plug. Had purchased one before and wanted to get another after I read they improved the watertight seal on the plug. Really tight seal now. I really liked my previous buy of this light before, but it’s even better with that watertight plug. I have ridden with this light in massive downpours but I did notice the previous light did tend to get rust in the plug. This newest version seems to correct this with that watertight tight plug. That plug is real tight and that’s a good thing. This light is the brightest light I ever had and that new watertight seal makes it even better.
customer_reviews.author: James Frazee

customer_reviews.title: Three 20 mile nighttime rides per week for last 3 months and haven't been disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: One year old. My unit has not been babied. The bike it's mounted on has been kept outside under open roofed deck for 365 days plus. Bike ridden 2500 mi. this last year. Bright light. Good range and wide angle of coverage. No longer blinded by on-coming LED headlights. They dim theirs or I WON'T dim mine. lol Easy removal and re-intall for charging (recharge in 2.5 hours. Holds charge for 6 hrs.). Tiny tail light is window dressing. Not worth the expense of the 2 wafer batteries it takes to power it. Wasn't needed. Head light sells itself.
customer_reviews.author: Marboro Hill

customer_reviews.title: I'm blind and I can not see
customer_reviews.text: The light is blindingly bright. I haven't used on my mtn bike yet, what with snow on the ground and all. The attachment does not look that great ... I may need to do some reconfiguring to make sure the light is secure ..
customer_reviews.author: Thomas W. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Super Bright - Great Functionality
customer_reviews.text: This light is incredibly bright! I am amazed at how far the beam allows me to see. It is perfect for biking. I also love the added functionality of being able to attach it to the included head band. I have now used it often for projects around the house. I no longer need someone to hold a flash light. I am able to aim it where needed and it stays on my head despite the sometimes awkward angles I work in. The battery lasts a long time. The lights on the charging cord make it very easy to know when it is fully charged. I am very satisfied and have already recommended it to others.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Great bargain, well made product, battery pack holds a good charge.
customer_reviews.text: This light has 3 settings, it is very bright, works well on tight single track at night, and also don’t need to worry about street traffic seeing me, they know i’m there. Bonus flashing red light for seat post is nice too.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Lee

customer_reviews.title: Nice Lights.  Needs improvement on mounting system if using for mtb. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: The mount seems like it will be good but it moves around quite a bit making it less than optimal for a mountain bike ride. The brightness of the lights are top notch. I’ve only used them a few times so far so no real review on battery life just yet. But they have lasted through a couple of night rides.
customer_reviews.author: L. Denton

product_meta.title: Super Bright Bike Light USB Rechargeable, Te-Rich 1200 Lumens Waterproof Road/Mountain Bicycle Headlight and LED Taillight Set with 4400 mAh Battery
feature_bullets: ✔FEAR NO DARKNESS: 1200 Lumen CREE XM-L2 LED Technology - This waterproof bike front light is bright enough to light up the trails and to see bumps on the road ahead when biking at night, it will definitely make your presence known on the road during evening rides or commutes

✔EASY TO INSTALL: Setup is straight-forward, no tools needed, simply hand turn the hardware until it's tight and secure on your bike handlebar in a desired location, simply screw off the light from the mount so you can take it with you when leaving the bike locked up outside

✔LONG RUNTIME: Powered by 5 volt 4400mhA rechargeable battery pack(included), the night riding light lasts approximately 4 hours on High(100% brightness), 8 hours on Medium(50% brightness), 12 hours on Low(25% brightness), Strobe(100% brightness)

✔VERSATILE USES: Except being a 360 degree cycle rotating torch for a bicycle, the mini safety flashlight can also be mounted on the included headstrap mount as a headlamp for outdoor sports such as trail riding, camping, fishing, hiking, trekking, hunting, night flying, sailing, caving, commuting and etc

✔UNIVERSAL FITMENT: The Te-Rich Bicycle headlamp fits tubes or handlebars up to 28 mm in diameter, compatible with handlebar of TREK, SALSA, JAMIS, SPECIALIZED, GIANT, DIAMONDBACK, SCHWINN, CANNONDALE, GT, SCOTT, MONGOOSE and more
